tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor has always been available 24/7 and will respond immediately whenever you require him. The best part is he will be available at your doorstep whenever required. Getting such a doctor is nothing but a blessing in disguise. On a personal note due to his thorough investigation, special attention  and his best medication during my hospitalization cured me from a major infected disease with ease. I feel probably no other doctor in Kolkata would pay so much attention and dedication for a patient. Taking this opportunity I would like to thank Doctor Mullick for all his support and his help throughout. Now my entire family consults him and have recommended many more!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Health Checkup (General),Medical Advisor,Diabetes Treatment, Pneumonia,varicose vein,
review:
Dr. Mallick is a very responsive and experienced doctor in treating patients with sensitivity and understanding.  I have always found Dr. Mallick spending a considerable amount of his precious time going through the patient's past records and remembering every point. My entire family and as well as my inlaws are overwhelmed by his empathy and commitment. He looks for treatment in totality and not only focuses on the immediate requirement. 
My experience has been amazing and satisfactory.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Consulted Dr Mallick during the pandemic situation for fever and covid related issues for all of my family members.. He provided us advice, treatment and medications by hearing in details and explained everything to us over television and video consultation.

I would recommend everyone to consult once with him and experience the ********* treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Doctor helped a lot for our medication and also helped during father hospitalization recommendations and post hospitalization treatment. We all recovered and doing great now ..He is surely recommended.  Thank you Doctor.
